title: test_context_pack_build_success
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx build' on a valid segment creates the context_pack.json file successfully.

title: test_context_pack_build_failure_missing_ctx_structure
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx build' on a segment missing the _ctx/ directory structure returns an error with appropriate details.

title: test_context_pack_validate_success
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx validate' on a valid context pack returns a validation passed message.

title: test_context_pack_validate_failure
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx validate' on an invalid or corrupted context pack returns validation failed with error details.

title: test_context_pack_sync_success
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx sync' on a valid segment completes successfully with a sync complete message.

title: test_context_pack_sync_failure
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx sync' on a segment with issues returns a sync failed message.

title: test_context_search_with_results
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx search' with a valid query returns search results containing chunk IDs.

title: test_context_search_no_results
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx search' with an ambiguous or invalid query returns zero results and suggests query refinement on stderr.

title: test_context_get_chunk_content_success
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx get' with valid chunk IDs and mode returns the chunk content in the requested mode (excerpt or full).

title: test_context_get_chunk_content_not_found
description: Verify that running 'trifecta ctx get' with non-existent chunk IDs returns an error indicating chunk not found.
